content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Iron Ore Mine at position(-17.0, -50.0)
Consists of following entities:
-  Burner mining drill (position -17.0, -50.0) and a transport belt at position(-16.5, -51.5)
-  Burner mining drill (position -15.0, -50.0) and a transport belt at position(-14.5, -51.5)
-  Burner inserter (position -13.5, -50.5) that picks up from transport belt at position(-14.5, -51.5) and drops at position(-13.5, -49.5)
-  Burner inserter (position -13.5, -48.5) that picks up from transport belt at position(-12.5, -48.5) and drops at position(-14.5, -48.5)

### Iron Plate Factory at position(-10.0, -49.0)
Consists of following entities:
-  Furnace (position -10.0, -49.0) that smelts iron ore into iron plate
-  Belt group that connects the furnace to the iron ore mine

### Storage at position(-16.5, -47.5)
Consists of following entities:
-  Wooden chest (position -16.5, -47.5) that stores items
-  Burner inserter (position -16.5, -46.5) that picks up from wooden chest at position(-16.5, -47.5) and drops at position(-16.5, -45.5)

### Storage at position(-9.5, -47.5)
Consists of following entities:
-  Wooden chest (position -9.5, -47.5) that stores items

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into an entity
-  Make sure the entity can accept the item being inserted
-  Ensure the entity is not full or blocked
### Errors when using insert_item function
-  The second argument must be an Entity or EntityGroup, not a Position
### Errors when placing entities
-  Ensure the tile is not occupied by another entity
### Errors when using burner mining drills
-  Make sure the drill is fueled and not blocked by items on the ground
-  Ensure there is a sink entity in place to accept the output

### NAMESPACE
*   `insert_item`: a function that inserts an item into an entity
    *   Failure modes: entity cannot accept the item, entity is full or blocked, incorrect arguments
    *   Success modes: item is successfully inserted into the entity
*   `burner-mining-drill`: an entity that mines resources
    *   Failure modes: out of fuel, output blocked by items on the ground
    *   Success modes: resources are successfully mined
*   Important variables:
    *   `inserter1`: an entity that inserts items into other entities (type: Entity)
    *   `inserter3`: an entity that inserts items into other entities (type: Entity)
    *   `iron-ore`: a resource that is mined and used to produce iron plates (type: Resource)
    *   `iron-plate`: a resource that is produced from iron ore (type: Resource)
